title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 33.8 - Licensee to obtain copy or photostat of permit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 33.8 - Licensee to obtain copy or photostat of permit

State Regulations

Each such permit shall be issued in duplicate and the
original permit shall be retained by the permittee. (a) When the permit authorizes purchases of
alcoholic beverages, the duplicate permit or photostat copy thereof, shall be
delivered by the permittee to the licensed manufacturer or wholesaler from whom
such permittee purchases alcoholic beverages. (b) Where the permit authorizes sales of
alcoholic beverages, the duplicate permit, or a photostat copy thereof, shall
be delivered to the licensed manufacturer, wholesaler or retailer to whom such
permittee sells alcoholic beverages. (c) Where the permit authorizes receipt of
alcoholic beverages, the duplicate permit, or a photostat copy thereof, shall
be delivered to the person who ships the merchandise to the
permittee. (d) The holder of a
negotiator's permit shall deliver the duplicate permit or a photostat copy
thereof to the wholesaler with whom such permittee negotiates for the
establishment of an agency to distribute its products. (e) Every licensee who sells, receives or
purchases alcoholic beverages from the holder of a miscellaneous permit shall
retain the duplicate permit or the photostat for a period of two
years. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
33.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
